Module kivakit.commandline
Package com.telenav.kivakit.commandline.parsing

Class ArgumentListValidator

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.validation.BaseValidator
com.telenav.kivakit.commandline.parsing.ArgumentListValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Validator
public class ArgumentListValidator extends BaseValidator
Not Public API

A simple argument list validator that checks argument quantity and optionality against usage.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • onValidate

      protected void onValidate()
      This method is implemented by the subclass. It may call BaseValidator.validate(Validator) on its superclass, and it must call BaseValidator.problemIf(boolean, String, Object...), BaseValidator.warningIf(boolean, String, Object...), BaseValidator.problem(String, Object...) or BaseValidator.warning(String, Object...) if there are any validation issues to report. If the problem methods are not called then the validation is valid.
      Specified by:
      onValidate in class BaseValidator
